title: Guidance: Register of licensed sponsors: students
text:
List of institutions licensed to sponsor migrant students under Tier 4. Document PDF , 169KB , 74 pages This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email . Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use. Detail 
This document lists institutions licensed to sponsor migrant students under Tier 4. It includes information about the category of students theyâ€™re licensed to sponsor and their sponsorship rating. Published:
